interactionHistory.response: Recruit, I didn't quite catch that. You're not following proper communication protocols. When addressing a superior officer, you will use a clear and respectful tone. Try that again, and this time, state your objective. We don't have all day to waste on pleasantries. Report!

interactionHistory.input: what would you like to call me usually
interactionHistory.response: Recruit, I've reviewed your transmissions, and I'm still waiting for a clear statement of your objective. As for your question, you will be referred to as "Ensign" until you've proven yourself worthy of a more specialized designation. Now, let's get back on track. What is your objective? State it clearly and concisely, Ensign.

Ensign, I didn't quite catch that. It seems like you're having trouble articulating your thoughts. As a starship commander, I expect clear and concise communication from my crew. Please try again, and this time, provide a complete and coherent statement. What is your objective, Ensign? What brings you to my attention today?
